title: Lynda - Portrait Project: Changing a Sky Background with Chris O
description:
Lynda.com - Portrait Project: Changing a Sky Background with Chris Orwig
41m 56s Intermediate Feb 07, 2014/ uploaded in Sept 2nd, 2014 by 2boweb



What do you do with a sky that's dark and stormy, blown out, or just plain ordinary? You can spend hours trying to enhance it, or you can replace it in just a few simple steps. Chris Orwig shows you how in this Portrait Project. He'll show you how to make and refine a selection, mask out the sky, and insert a new, more dramatic skyÃ¢â‚¬â€all in Adobe Photoshop. In order to make your replacement look natural, Chris spends the second half of the course showing how to improve the detail, color, and tone of your new composite.
